tengp.mutations module¶

class tengp.mutations.Move(indices, changes)[source]¶

Bases: object

class holding a change contains two lists:

  • list of affected indicies
  • list of values to apply
tengp.mutations.active_mutation(individual)[source]¶

Perform an active mutation - to-be mutated gene is chosen only from active genes

tengp.mutations.point_mutation(individual)[source]¶

perform a point mutation on given individual returns Move object

tengp.mutations.probabilistic_mutation(individual, probability=0.25)[source]¶

Perform a probabilistic mutation - at each gene position there is a chance it will mutate

tengp.mutations.random() → x in the interval [0, 1).¶
tengp.mutations.single_mutation(individual)[source]¶

perform a ‘single’ mutation - mutate until active gene is changed
